column4: Ok help me out here, i was told to close x for a driver update... ctrl alt f1... i get no prompt
it closed x but still no prompy
it says im still running x server tho
alt + F2    sudo service gdm stop   when on the desktop
i seen no mention of ssh, alt + F7 would have returned the system to gui after you did a alt + F1
and    sudo service gdm stop    is howto stop gnome
ok but i followed the service stop comment to... so it stopped gdm... and alt f7 only gave black screen... hit it again... back to prompt... now when i sudo sh nvidiaBLABH BLAH.run its working now
is it really necessary touse the latest driver, its best to use whats in the repo unless you have no other option. i mean dont just doit because its a newer version...
can ya help me out a min?
